articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Vietnamese Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Vietnamese Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV).
					 The message sent warm congratulations and kindly comradely greetings to Nguyen Phu Trong on the successful 12th Congress of the CPV and his reelection as general secretary of the CPV Central Committee.
					
					 The message noted that his reelection is an expression of the deep trust and expectation of all the party members and people towards him.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and countries having a long history and tradition would continue to favorably develop in the struggle for accomplishing the common cause of socialism, the message wished the general secretary great success in his responsible work for the development of the party and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Delegation Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Pak Myong Guk left here for Russia on Friday.

articles.title: Inter-governmental Protocols Signed between DPRK and Cuba
articles.content:
Inter-governmental Protocols Signed between DPRK and Cuba
 Havana, January 28 (KCNA) -- Inter-governmental protocols on the meeting for economic, scientific and technological cooperation and development in 2016 and commodity exchange in 2016 were signed between the DPRK and Cuba in Havana on Thursday.
					 They were inked by Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to the DPRK, and Rodrigo Malmierca Diaz, minister of Trade and Foreign Investment of Cuba.

articles.title: DPRK Physical Acrobatics Awarded Top Prize at Massy International Circus Festival
articles.content:
DPRK Physical Acrobatics Awarded Top Prize at Massy International Circus Festival
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The physical acrobatics "Three-stage Trapeze Flight" presented by DPRK acrobats was awarded the presidential prize of the Republic of France, the top prize of the 24th Massy International Circus Festival.
					 The festival started in Massy, France from Jan. 21 to 24 brought together acrobats from 12 countries including the DPRK, Germany, Russia, Switzerland, France and Britain. 
					
					 In the acrobatic piece the DPRK acrobats exhibited bold and skilful movements requiring high technique.
					
					 They returned home on Friday.

articles.title: Recreational Season for Peasants Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
Recreational Season for Peasants Begins in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Recreational season for peasants has begun at different resorts in the DPRK this year.
					 According to Jo Yong Chol, a vice department director of the Ministry of Labour, the season for this year is divided into two terms, 15 days for each one, with the first starting from January 29.
					
					 The system of rest at sanatoria and holiday homes has been enforced after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, thanks to the measure taken by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The law on social insurance was enacted in December 1946, which provides legal guarantee to the building of many resorts in different scenic spots of the country to be run at government expense.

articles.title: Agent for Supplementing Water Developed
articles.content:
Agent for Supplementing Water Developed
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Newly developed agent for supplementing water has been widely introduced into the forest restoration campaign now under brisk headway in the DPRK.
					 Dr. Ko Pyong Du of the Academy of Forest Science told KCNA that the agent was developed as part of the research into the scientific and technical problems arising in breeding tree and creating and protecting forest.
					
					 It plays a role of humidifying the earth around roots while ensuring the rate of rooting at 85-90 percent, irrespective of species of trees and topographical conditions, he said.
					
					 He added that the agent is also low in production cost.

articles.title: Campaign Launched in DPRK to Effect Turn in Medical Service
articles.content:
Campaign Launched in DPRK to Effect Turn in Medical Service
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A campaign has been launched in the public health sector of the DPRK to bring about a radical turn in the medical service.
					 The Okryu Children's Hospital, Ryugyong Dental Hospital and Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and other health service centers in the country are striving to give full play to the advantages of the socialist health system.
					
					 According to an official concerned, big efforts are paid to making the health workers enhance their responsibility in the treatment of patients with sincerity.
					
					 A brisk work goes on to share the experience in medical treatment among health organs and introduce such new therapies as methods of treating slipped disk and improve the method of treating congenital heart diseases.
					
					 Local hospitals are conducting a work to apply the painless delivery and other new treatment methods on a sci-tech basis of higher level.
					
					 Also, steps are taken to build up the competent medical workers and supply enough medical appliances and medicines.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Kim Man Yu Hospital and many other hospitals of the country are intensifying the medical service at industrial establishments.

articles.title: Party's Songun Leadership Guarantees Final Victory of Juche Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Party's Songun Leadership Guarantees Final Victory of Juche Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Songun revolutionary leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un serves as an engine ensuring the high prestige and victory of the great Paektusan nation and provides a sure guarantee for the final victory, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article. 
					 The Songun revolutionary leadership of our party serves as an invincible banner making the DPRK win victory after victory in the anti-U.S. struggle with the invincible military muscle, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The military muscle is the core of national power and bolstering up the arms of the revolution is the true way of protecting the security of the country and the destiny of the people. A country can protect and ensure genuine peace when its own strength and self-defensive military muscle are strong enough as proved by the past history and the present reality. 
					
					 Only when the Korean People's Army remains strong, can it firmly uphold the red flag of the revolution and victoriously advance the socialist cause of Juche. This is the steadfast faith and will of Kim Jong Un. With this strong will he kicked off the first advance in the new century of Juche by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army. He has worked heart and soul to bolster up the People's Army for the past four years. 
					
					 The service personnel of the KPA have grown up to be stalwart fighters capable of waging modern warfare, possessed of invincible Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics, heroic fighting spirit, daring attack mode and perfect actual war capability, and the military technical power of the KPA has been put on the highest level to defeat any formidable enemy at one stroke. This is entirely ascribable to the great Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Self-Development Is Vital to Carving out Destiny of Country: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Self-Development Is Vital to Carving out Destiny of Country: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- It is possible to build an independent world when the world people struggle, bearing in mind that victory is always in store for independence and justice in the confrontation with the imperialists, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 One gets weak when divided, whereas one grows strong when goes united. Unity is more important than anything else and it is a crucial task to achieve the unity under the situation where the imperialists get more undisguised than ever before in their divide-and-rule tactics. 
					
					 The independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence are the principles fundamental to building a thriving country with one's own efforts.
					
					 The building of an independent and sovereign state would be unthinkable without these principles.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged in its objective to bring down other countries and achieve its sinister ambition through high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 It is necessary to decisively foil the robber-like U.S. imperialists' hysteria with an uncompromising independent stand, self-support in national economy and powerful weaponry and strike means.
					
					 The progressive people over the world are called upon to wage a relentless struggle to cultivate their own strength, believing in their own efforts regarded as the mightiest in the world, and thus bring earlier the victory of the cause of the independence against imperialism.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Turning S. Korea into Nuclear Arsenal
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Turning S. Korea into Nuclear Arsenal
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson on Friday carries a commentary on the lapse of 58 years since the U.S. officially announced that it introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					 Recalling that after sustaining a heavy defeat in the past Korean War the U.S. introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea in a bid to recover from it in wanton breach of the Armistice Agreement, the commentary notes:
					
					 For several decades since then it has reduced south Korea to the biggest nuclear arsenal in the world and the most dangerous source of a nuclear war. 
					
					 This is a product of its harsh hostile policy toward the DPRK and reckless moves for igniting a nuclear war, a proof that it is none other than the U.S. which spawned the nuclear issue in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The massive shipment of nuclear weapons and other nuclear means into south Korea after the war reduced it to an exhibition ground of nuclear weapons as all varieties and types of U.S.-made nuclear weapons are deployed there.
					
					 All these facts go to eloquently prove that the nuclear issue in the peninsula was spawned entirely due to the U.S. introduction of nuclear weapons into south Korea and the U.S. is the arch criminal bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the peninsula.
					
					 It is clear to everyone that the U.S. is obliged to pull its nuclear weapons out of south Korea and stop the nuclear war drills disturbing peace and stability in the peninsula.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. is ceaselessly introducing nuclear means into south Korea and its vicinity while driving the situation to the brink of a war. It is the height of shamelessness for the U.S. to shift the responsibility for the escalating tension onto the DPRK and raise a hue and cry over someone's "provocations."

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Cooperation with Outside Forces Will Only Cause Evil Cycle of Disgrace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Cooperation with Outside Forces Will Only Cause Evil Cycle of Disgrace: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- If one depends on outside forces to solve the national problem, one has to read their faces, sandwiched among big powers, and can never get rid of submission and subjugation. This is the bitter lesson drawn from the past distress-torn history of the Korean nation, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said fact is no more than the miserable fate of the south Korean authorities who prolong their remaining days through dependence on outside forces.
					
					 A ramshackle boat called south Korean diplomacy is sailing in great danger because of rising waves at a time when big powers clash with one another in their interests in Northeast Asia.
					
					 To cap it all, the south Korean authorities' humiliating negotiations on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army are sparking off resentment among the people, throwing them into consternation.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove once again that what shameful consequences are entailed by their conspiracy and nexus with outside forces to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 A scrutiny into the essence of the south Korean diplomacy shows that it is nothing but cooperation with outside forces to carry out the policy of escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities stoop to any infamy, if they calculate they can garner support and get recognized by outside forces on the policy of confrontation with the DPRK and realize the "cooperation in the anti-north campaign." This is the ulterior intention of the group of traitors.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive is now finding herself in the mire of submission and disgrace by pursuing the cooperation with outside forces to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and to ignite a war against it and blindly following the policy of toeing the policies of the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 South Korea is derided for its blind "lobster and blockhead diplomacy," swept by the rising waves brought by big powers under the watchword of "balanced diplomacy." 
					
					 The south Korean authorities can never get rid of disgrace unless they drop the bad habit of standing in confrontation with the compatriots in the north, backed by outside forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Making Humiliating Agreement with Japan on Issue of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Making Humiliating Agreement with Japan on Issue of Sexual Slavery
 Tokyo, January 28 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Union of Korean Students in Japan sent the south Korean embassy in Tokyo on Jan. 27 a statement lambasting the south Korean authorities' act of shielding the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement said the Korean students studying in Japan couldn't repress their resentment as Koreans at the south Korean authorities' assertion that the issue of sexual slavery "found a final and irreversible solution" at the negotiations with the Japanese authorities on Dec. 28 last year.
					
					 The "agreement" mentioned neither legal responsibility nor reparation on the part of the Japanese government, the statement noted, and added:
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities made a humiliating "agreement" in utter disregard of the requirements of the times.
					
					 The statement demanded the south Korean authorities halt at once their treacherous acts of going against the will of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Austrian Body's Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Austrian Body's Website
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK on its website on Jan. 22.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and indicates the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and tasks to successfully accomplish the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Syria
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Syria
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Socialist Unionist Party of Syria for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) was formed on Jan. 21.
					 Adnan Ismail, general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and organize colorful political and cultural events on the above-said occasions.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Poland
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Poland
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Polish preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) was formed in Warsaw on Jan. 23.
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary careers and feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Myanmar
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Myanmar
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Myanmar preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) was formed in Yangon on Jan. 22.
					 Tha Win, member of the Central Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and secretary of its Yangon Regional Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee fixed the celebration period from Jan. 22 to the end of April and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events including meeting, lecture, film show and photo exhibition in praise of the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Romania
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Romania
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) was formed in Romania on Jan. 19.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the feats of Kim Jong Il from Jan. 25 to Feb. 16.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Sweden
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) was formed on January 21.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Icelandic Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Icelandic Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- An Icelandic preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Reykjavik on January 23.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Conclusion of DPRK-U.S. Peace Treaty Urged by French Organization
articles.content:
Conclusion of DPRK-U.S. Peace Treaty Urged by French Organization
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on Jan. 21 urging the conclusion of the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty.
					 The statement accused the U.S. of getting more frantic with the moves for a nuclear war from the outset of the new year, finding fault with the DPRK's legitimate self-defensive measure, as evidenced by the former's amassing of nuclear strike means in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 The DPRK has long been exposed to the harshest sanctions in the world.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently shunned the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 The Armistice Agreement cannot ensure peace in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association calls for concluding the DPRK-U.S. peace treaty, expressing concern about the ever-growing tension in the peninsula and sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 There should be dialogue for concluding a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. and climate for trusting each other.
					
					 We will as ever make efforts for peace in the peninsula, Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Struggle Supported by Myanmar Body
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Struggle Supported by Myanmar Body
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Myanmar preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il) will give wide publicity to the exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders, and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un and extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.
					 This is said in a notice on the formation of the above-said committee made public by the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar on January 22.
					
					 The notice warmly congratulated the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people on significantly greeting the 104th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung and the 74th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that it was of great significance for the Korean people and the world progressives to significantly celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star in 2016 when all the Korean people are making unprecedented successes and miracles in the struggle for building a thriving nation on the threshold of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rubricados protocolos entre gobiernos de la RPDC y RC
articles.content:
Rubricados protocolos entre gobiernos de la RPDC y RC
La Habana, 28 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedaron suscritos el dia 28 en La Habana el protocolo de la reunion para el desarrollo de la colaboracion economica y cientifico-tecnica para 2016 y el otro sobre el intercambio comercial para el mismo ano entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Cuba.
					Los firmaron Pak Chang Yul, embajador coreano acreditado en el pais caribeno, y Rodrigo Malmierca Diaz, ministro de Comercio e Inversion Extranjera de Cuba.

articles.title: Iniciado reposo invernal de trabajadores agricolas
articles.content:
Iniciado reposo invernal de trabajadores agricolas
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciado el reposo invernal del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche en los lugares famosos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Segun Jo Yong Chol, subdirector del Ministerio del Trabajo, el reposo invernal de este ano se realiza en dos ocasiones con periodo de 15 dias.
					
					  El primer periodo de reposo es desde el 29 de enero hasta el 12 de febrero.
					
					  Los trabajadores agricolas de las provincias de Jagang, Phyong-an del Sur y Hamgyong de Sur pasan dias alegres en las Casas de Reposo Myohyangsan, Sok-am y Songdan, donde juegan a las diversiones deportivas y se disfrutan de la civilizada vida cultural.
					
					   Este regimen de reposo regular se realizo desde la epoca de construccion de una nueva patria bajo la atencion del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					   En diciembre de 1946 fue aprobada la ley de seguro social y se acondicionaron muchas instalaciones de reposo con gastos estatales en los montes y lugares famosos.
					
					   Alli, cientos de miles trabajadores gozan cada ano de beneficios gratuitos. 
					
					   Por otra parte, se organizan las similares actividades en todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: EE.UU. convirtio el Sur de Corea en polvorin nuclear, condena Minju Joson
articles.content:
EE.UU. convirtio el Sur de Corea en polvorin nuclear, condena Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- El periodico Minju Joson inserto en su edicion fechada 29 un comentario individual dedicado al 58o aniversario de la publicacion oficial de la introduccion de las armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea por parte de Estados Unidos.
					 Desde cuando EE.UU. introdujo las armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea infringiendo el Acuerdo de Armisticio para recuperarse de la derrota amarga en la guerra coreana y ocupar a toda costa la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hasta la fecha el Sur de Corea se ha convertido en el mayor polvorin nuclear del mundo y el mas peligroso origen de la guerra nuclear, comienza el comentario y prosigue:
					
					  Esto siendo producto de la atroz politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y las imprudentes maniobras de guerra nuclear comprueba que el autor del surgimiento del problema nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana es precisamente EE.UU.
					
					  En la actualidad, el suelo surcoreano se ha convertido en la exposicion de las armas nucleares de todas clases y todos tipos producidos en EE.UU.
					
					  Todos los hechos demuestran elocuentemente que el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana surgio desde cuando EE.UU. introdujo las armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea y que este imperio es la cabecilla que lleva el nubarron de la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Es muy claro que EE.UU. es autor que debe retirar sus armas nucleares y renunciar la campana de guerra nuclear encaminada a perjudicar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Sin embargo, EE.UU. lleva la situacion a la fase de guerra imputando a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana e introduciendo incesantemente los pertrechos nucleares en el Sur de Corea y la region periferica bajo pretexto de hacer frente a la "provocacion" de alguien.
					
					  Tales maniobras es la extremidad del cinismo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena la colaboracion con fuerzas foraneas del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena la colaboracion con fuerzas foraneas del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 29 de enero (ACNC) -- La historia coreana llena de martirios ensena la leccion amarga de que si uno solicita a las fuerzas extranjeras solucionar el problema nacional se ve obligado a observar la actitud de las grandes potencias y no evitar la sumision y subyugacion.
					Asi adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de hoy y prosigue:
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas mantienen siempre su vida restante apoyandose en las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					En los ultimos anos en que la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico se torna mas compleja por las disputas de los intereses entre las grandes potencias la diplomacia surcoreana se encuentra en el estado tan peligroso como si fuera un barco en el mar furioso. En particular, las autoridades surcoreanas estan atemorizadas ante la oleada de rencor de los habitantes creada por la negociacion subyugante en torno al problema de esclavitud sexual del viejo ejercito japones.
					
					La situacion volvio a demostrar fehacientemente cual resultado vergonzoso trajo la confabulacion con las fuerzas extranjeras por la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					La diplomacia surcoreana es, en su esencia, la cooperacion con las fuerzas extranjeras para realizar la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC.
					
					La banda titere surcoreana no vacila nada para ganar el respaldo y el reconocimiento de las fuerzas extranjeras sobre su politica conflictiva anti-RPDC y realizar la "confabulacion anti-RPDC" con el extranjero.
					
					Para lograr este objeto la mandataria surcoreana practico la politica proyanqui y projapones, con el cual se ha hecho blanco de sumision y verguenza.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, la "diplomacia equilibrada", de que vociferan tanto los titeres surcoreanos, esta burlada como la "diplomacia bobalicona".
					
					Mientras que las autoridades surcoreanas no abandonen la mala costumbre de confrontacion fratricida, no podran evitar la infamia y el oprobio.
